p: Imperatorin show anti-tumor properties by inhibiting the phosphorylation of PI3K, Akt, and mTOR in human gastric adenocarcinoma cells ( 19). Dong ( 20) synthesized a novel hybrid of 3-benzyl coumarin deca-B-ring derivative and nitric oxide donor benzenesulfonyl furan glycans, and confirmed that this hybrid could inhibit the expression of mTOR and the phosphorylation of mTOR and Akt in non-small-cell lung cancer cells.
